description.value:
You learn dream-related magic to aid your studies. Choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dream Message] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sleep] upon taking this feat; you learn this spell as a 4th-level innate occult spell. If you choose sleep, you can cast the spell only while in a Daydream Trance. You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your spellcasting ability for these spells is Wisdom.

Special You can take this feat twice, gaining the spell you didn't select initially the second time.
